name: ENERGY STAR Res. GSHP (LFL)

energy_efficiency_source.notes: 2022 ENERGY STAR v3.2 performance level residential ground-source heat pumps; COP = EER/3.41214

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

installed_cost_source.notes: Lower total installed costs for ENERGY STAR v3.2 GSHPs in 2022; total installed costs include ground loop, but like-for-like replacement will not necessarily require that work; the lower bound cost is used assuming sometimes higher than minimum equipment cost offsets the cost reduction from not needing to replace the ground loop

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of low and high average lifetime values for GSHPs in 2022, rounded down from 14.5

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

_description: ENERGY STAR v3.2 residential closed loop ground source heat pump in 2022, like-for-like replacement (i.e., replacing GSHP with new GSHP)
